EXPERIENCE 

### THE WONDER - ANYTIME!

### Become a Member & visit whenever you want!   
  
Members receive FREE or reduced admission to hundreds of reciprocal museums, nature centers, & botanical gardens across the country!

[Become a Member Today!](https://wondergardens.mystagingwebsite.com/membership/)

Party

### We’re bringing a new vision for the Wonders Garden to life – including exciting new exhibits for all ages to enjoy!

CLICK HERE TO LEARN MORE!

admission_text:
# Membership

[ Become A Member Today! ](https://interland3.donorperfect.net/weblink/WebLink.aspx?name=E330577&id=2)

## now offering digital membership cards! 

[ Click Here to download your digital card ](https://admin.membershipanywhere.com:/#/wallet/link/RXZlcmdsYWRlcyB3b25kZXIgZ2FyZGVucw%3D%3D)

##### _**_MEMBERSHIP PRICES EFFECTIVE JUNE 1, 2024_**_

 _Become a member at the Wonder Gardens and help us continue our mission to offer our community and its visitors an educational, recreational, environmental and historical resource._

##### **MEMBERSHIP INCLUDES:**

###### _Unlimited FREE admission for one full year_

######  _20% off Wonder Shoppe (gift shop) purchases_

 _**FREE** or reduced admission to over 200 participating nature centers and over 300 participating botanical gardens nationwide (many in Florida)_

**Membership Levels:**

**General** – **$75 One Individual**

**Plus One** – **$100 Two Individuals**

**Family – $125 Two Adults and up to 6 children (under 18)**

**Extended Family –** **$185 Four Adults and up to 6 children (under 18)**

All memberships include reciprocal agreements with the following organizations:

  * [Association of Nature Center Administrators ](https://natctr.org/membership/reciprocal-program)
  * [American Horticultural Society](https://ahsgardening.org/gardening-programs/rap/)

Plus One ($100 level) memberships and above include reciprocal agreements with the above organizations:

  * [North American Reciprocal Museum Association ](h...
